title: S&P500 ML Quant Strategy
text:
I wanted to share what Iâ€™ve been working on in case any friends might find this useful or interesting. This is a quantitative stock selection strategy. It uses machine learning (ML) models to rank stocks in the S&P500 and selects the highest ranking ones.
This strategy has been live since November 26 and this chart shows the performance and some basic statistics.
